name: Seagull Team Six
description: Seagull Team Six places you in the shoes (claws?) of Agent Seagull, America's top secret agent. You'll have to combat waves of enemy soldiers with... poop. Luckily, you have the support of some of the country's best scientists, willing to help you become faster, stronger and, well, able to make a lot more poop. For a price, you can become a super seagull, but it'll take courage and bravado to get there. Do you have what it takes?
